info.headline: Extreme Heat Watch issued July 26 at 7:07PM EDT until July 28 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville FL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 109 expected. For the Extreme Heat Watch, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 113 possible.
* WHERE...Atkinson, Coffee, and Jeff Davis Counties.
* WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from noon to 7 PM EDT Sunday. For the Extreme Heat Watch, from Monday afternoon through Monday evening.
* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

parameter.value: HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...EXTREME HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING
